{{product.title}} {{product.description}} {{product.price}} {{product.rating}} {{product.brand}} {{product.category}}
import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Products } from './products-list/products'; import { ProductsService } from './products-list/products.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent implements OnInit{ products:Array = []; constructor(public productService:ProductsService, private router:Router, private route: ActivatedRoute){ } ngOnInit(): void{ this.loadAllProducts(); } categories(){ this.router.navigate(["/products/categories"], {relativeTo: this.route}); } loadAllProducts(){ this.productService.loadAllProductDetails().subscribe({ next:(result: any) => { this.products = result; }, error:(error:any) => { }, complete:() => { } }) } addProduct(){ let flagDelete = confirm("Do you want to delete this product?"); if(flagDelete){ this.productService.deleteProductById(id).subscribe({ next:(result:any) => { console.log(result); }, error:(error:any) => { console.log("Error"); }, complete:() => { this.loadAllProducts(); console.log(`Product ${id} deleted`); } }) }else{ alert("Product didn\'t delete") } } }
